title: Firefox for Android 55.0 Release

notes.note:
Added actions to manage tabs

 - You can now set your homepage as your new tab
 - You can now reorder tabs by tapping and holding a tab in the tabs tray (or in the tab strip on tablets)
Added option to accessibility settings to respect the system's set font size when displaying web pages
Video that is not visible will stop rendering to conserve power (audio will still continue)
Note: Firefox 55 is the last version that supports devices running Android 4.0
Sites that don’t use SSL can no longer access Geolocation APIs to determine a user’s physical location

text:
We'd also like to extend a special thank you to all of the [new Mozillians][1] who contributed to this release of Firefox!

[1]: https://blog.mozilla.org/community/2017/08/02/firefox-55-new-contributors/
system_requirements:
## Operating systems
 - Android 4.0
 - Above versions

## Requirements
 - 50 MB internal storage
 - 384 MB of RAM
 - display at least 320 pixels high and 240 pixels wide

*Note: Firefox for Android 55 is the last version that supports devices running Android 4.0.*
